issues.message: Use 'Akka.Actor.ExtendedActorSystem' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.Internal.ActorSystemImpl'.
Use 'Akka.Actor.ExtendedActorSystem' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.Internal.ActorSystemImpl'.
Use 'Akka.Actor.ActorRefBase' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Remote.RemoteActorRef'.
Use 'Akka.Actor.ActorSystem' here; it is a more general type than 'Akka.Actor.ExtendedActorSystem'.
